snippet: A federal court hearing over same-sex marriage bans in Idaho, Nevada and Hawaii began Monday with a lawyer defending Idaho’s ban facing tough questions from a judge on the panel
abstract: Federal appeals court in San Francisco is listening to arguments over the constitutionality of same-sex marriage bans in Idaho, Nevada and Hawaii.
lead_paragraph: A federal court hearing over same-sex marriage bans in Idaho, Nevada and Hawaii began Monday with a lawyer defending Idaho’s ban facing tough questions from a judge on the panel

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
